title: What to do if we forget an ayah in the middle of the surah in prayer | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem - JAL
transcript: muhammad from the u.s he says while i'm reading and reciting what happens if i were to forget the ayah that i was reciting afterwards i forgot so should i skip it yes you can skip it you can say al mustang regime and recite another surah and you can go for record either way there is no problem in that inshallah
